thread.title: Hank Rogers
thread.title_full: Carpet Baggers Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Hank Rogers

author: Hank Rogers
title: Hank Rogers
text:
We met Katie at the home show and needed flooring after water damage. She picked out the perfect CoreTecPlus flooring for our whole downstairs.
Her crew was professional and fast. We absolutely love our new floors.
